try

catch

try/catch statement.

Syntax

try, statements_1, catch, statements_2, end

Description

try and catch statements are used for error handling and control in files.

Example

try/catch in a script file

try 
error('an error')
catch
  disp('error catched')
end

See also

run, execstr.

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET
